timeline.message:
[powermax] Removed dependency on 'org.apache.commons.io.IOUtils'

Relative to #7722

Signed-off-by: Laurent Garnier <lg.hc@free.fr>

timeline.bodyText: I think using closeQuietly is wrong here. The description clearly says, that it should only be used when normal processing failed (e.g. to close after an exception has been thrown and we are in a finally block), This is clearly not the case here. I would prefer to log something in case closing failes.
timeline.author: J-N-K
